entry.message: [info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpvm9fa28n\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0118.9575] The statement 000002 - Statement - Condensed Balance Sheets includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:StockholdersEquity of -14,275,379 in the default should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -14,275,479. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 0. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. If a value is not available then the values associated with the members of the dimension are used to complete the calculation. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2022-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:StockholdersEquity that should add to -14,275,379 are comprised of the following:
+ AdditionalPaidInCapital 71,271,501 + CommitmentsAndContingencies 0 + CommonStockValue 75,450 + PreferredStockValue 0 + RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit -85,087,855 - TreasuryStockValue 534,575
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 000002 - Statement - Condensed Balance Sheets. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will add dimension components as well, so if the calculation is correct and the breakdown is a dimension, then check to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly. Values calculated by adding a dimension member are shown in the calculation.
Total Element : us-gaap:StockholdersEquity Total Value : -14,275,379 Total period : 2022-06-30 Dimensions : Decimals : 0 Rule Element Id:9575 Rule version: 18.0.6 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1353499/000147793222006567/maxd_10q.htm 1
